title: [RESOLVED] 4/28 Continued Maintenance -- Ranked will be Disabled/Possible DC's
body:
>#UPDATE 3:12PM PDT:

>We are fairly confident that these specific login issues should now be fully resolved.  If you are still experiencing login issues, it may be completely unrelated.  In this case, make sure to submit us a ticket so we can investigate further.

>We appreciate everyones patience while we worked through this!

-------------------------

>#UPDATE 1:13PM PDT:

>After a lot of tinkering and changes, we believe that we have mostly resolved the login issues completely.  If you are still not able to login at this point, continue to post your location (city/state) as well as your ISP here in this thread.  We'll continue to have network engineers regularly checking the thread for players still having issues.

-------------------------

>#UPDATE 9:33AM PDT:

>If you are now able to successfully login, please post your location (city/state) and your ISP.  If you are ***still*** not able to login, make sure to also post your location and ISP.  We are going to need to dig into some individual cases to make sure whether we have resolved this, or simply moved the issue somewhere else.

>More updates to follow!

-------------------------

>***TLDR:  We are doing another round of maintenance on the NA Servers to hopefully resolve the [issues from 4/27](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/vVgXxfRQ-427-live-maintenance-possible-dcs-ranked-disabled).***

Hey all,

The [maintenance ](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/76/Heimerdinger_BlastZoneSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141008232513)we performed on 4/27 was meant to patch several bugs on our back-end routing (No, not [this](http://i.imgur.com/NKy9m2j.jpg), think [bigger and more...mutated)](http://i.imgur.com/ZKI2CyG.jpg) with our platform/servers.  While we finished the vast majority of the work on-time while most everyone was sleeping, we left a few un-patched devices to be completed in the near future.  Unfortunately, while we were shifting around traffic as we worked on getting devices patched up, we actually triggered the very bug we were trying to resolve on the remaining un-patched devices.  We attempted to get this resolved during the day, but the fix will required fairly in-depth work.

We’ve decided to perform another set of maintenance again on 4/28.  Ranked will be disabled at 12:30AM PDT.  Once all games finish and at 2:00AM PDT, we will deploy our fix and keep ranked disabled while we work.  We’ll update everyone once we start getting our hands dirty.

I understand that stuff happens but it blows that I had the day off and didn't get to play any.

I feel like i should make a joke about how the guy from "player support communications" is an adc main and thus probably has no idea what support actually entails... but im too angry because i cant play the game.

Ooooo, good call-out!  Back in Season 1 I actually mained Taric to get Bronze (which was 1250 ELO at the time if I remember) and in Season 5, I mainly played Brand Support to climb up to Gold.  So I do know what it means to support!  I'm hoping to do it more consistent with the new Taric release though, super effin' hyped!
So this means if we can't log in now we won't be able to for at least another day??? Okay...{{item:3070}}

So... I'm gunna say that maybe... just MAYBE you should stop doing Live maintenance? I mean I'm sure if youd have just shut down the servers at a said time instead of leaving it running and people on. this may have been avoided? I don't know... just seems like everything goes to hell in a hand basket when Live maintenance is being done.

Live maintenance is always preferable to shutting everything down for a big company. Can you imagine if Amazon just shut down all of their servers for a few hours to do maintenance? The result would be massive profit losses for them. All of Riot's revenue comes from online transactions, transactions that might not happen if the person has a few more hours to think about it.

Back before Riot got too damn big for their britches they used to shut down for Maintenance every time they had a new patch coming out. Now that they have a huge fan base they started saying fuck it and doing live maintenance which is an awful idea. nothing but problems come from this. never had any issues before when they'd shut it down. (well super major ones like this) biggest issue we had was the login que where we would have to wait 1-15 minutes to get into the game.

They can choke down their damn pride and do this shit right the first time. when the servers are shutdown.

Also dont compare Amazon to the League THEY ARE NOWHERE NEAR SIMILAR in the difficulty of the coding, Amazon is hell of a lot more easier to do.
You're literally saying "when Riot was a smaller company, they handled IT like a smaller company." No mature company would prefer to shut down all their servers at once.
Once again riot shows how shitty there customer support and thoughts of there clients are. thx for showing you dont care
So what youre saying is, I wont be able to login or do anything till you decide to get back at fixing whatever the issue is??? Awesome!!!! Thanks. >:(
